headline: Albemarle (NYSE:ALB) Stock Slides 14% After Sales Dip US$1,124 Million
summary: Albemarle (NYSE:ALB) experienced a price decline of 14% last week, a period marked by several significant developments. Investors might have processed the company's affirmation of a quarterly dividend of $0.405 per share, shortly after the announcement of its Q4 2024 earnings. Although Albemarle reported improved net income of $75 million compared to the previous year's net loss, sales decreased significantly to $1,232 million from $2,356 million. Meanwhile, there was turmoil in the broader...
